When compiling gettext 0.16.1, an error may occure:
./localename.c:1145: error: duplicate case value ./localename.c:1144: error: previously used here ./localename.c:1359: error: duplicate case value ./localename.c:1358: error: previously used here ./localename.c:1367: error: duplicate case value ./localename.c:1366: error: previously used here
You have to open the file localename.c and replace the constant names directly by their corresponding values (0x00, 0x01):
Example: case /*SUBLANG_BENGALI_INDIA*/0x00: return "bn_IN"; case /*SUBLANG_BENGALI_BANGLADESH*/0x01: return "bn_BD";

set.commands: oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegimport libiconv-1.14 oegextract gettext-0.18.3.tar.gz configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} make make install DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive gettext-0.18.3
